snippet: Jets running back Joe McKnight is looking forward to the season because he could be put in several positions. “I feel like it’s going to be my year,” he said.
abstract: New York Jets running back Joe McKnight is looking forward to the season because he could be put in several positions; is an ideal third-down back, able to run the ball and catch passes, but has competition in Bilal Powell, a second-year back, who also has a chance to fill the retired LaDainian Tomlinson's role.
lead_paragraph: Jets running back Joe McKnight is looking forward to the season because he could be put in several positions. “I feel like it’s going to be my year,” he said.

headline.seo: With Chance to Do More, Jets’ McKnight Gets Serious
headline.main: Given Opportunity, and Competition, McKnight Gets Serious
headline.print_headline: A Chance to Play Tomlinson’s Part
